songs.title: Strange Love
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Strange love

[Verse 1]
You're shining ultraviolet, I'll be your rainbow bride
You'll be the silver lining in the blackness of the night
It was written in the stars, piqued my curiosity
And since now we're falling hard, give you everything you need
I got you, you got me, and we're turning up the speed as the city closes down

[Chorus]
This is such a strange love, caught me by surprise
We'll catch the moon set, watching side by side
Until the sunrise and our eyes collide
It's such a strange love, it's such a strange love

[Verse 2]
You're in my line of fire, locked and loaded, beam of light
Just like a love elixir, you bring me back to life
It was written in the stars, piqued my curiosity
Like a bullet to the heart when you swept me off my feet
I got you, you got me, and we'll never go to sleep as the city closes down

[Chorus]
This is such a strange love, caught me by surprise
We'll catch the moon set, watching side by side
Until the sunrise and our eyes collide
It's such a strange love, it's such a strange love

[Post-Chorus]
It's such a strange love, crazy, roll the dice
We'll catch the moon set, sippin' Diamond Ice
Until the sunrise over paradise
It's such a strange love, it's such a strange love

[Bridge]
Have you ever felt so out of mind? (Such a strange love)
Out-of-body, high like purple skies (such a strange love)
Never gonna come down (this is such a strange love)
This is such a strange love (strange love caught me by surpise)

[Chorus]
This is such a strange love, caught me by surprise
We'll catch the moon set, watching side by side
Until the sunrise and our eyes collide
It's such a strange love, it's such a strange love

[Post-Chorus]
It's such a strange love, crazy, roll the dice
We'll catch the moon set, sippin' Diamond Ice
Until the sunrise over paradise
It's such a strange love, it's such a strange love
